title: Effective fear of heights treatment without a therapist using virtual reality, study suggests

title_detail.value: Effective fear of heights treatment without a therapist using virtual reality, study suggests

summary: A fully self-guided treatment using virtual reality (VR) is effective in reducing fear of heights. A team of researchers developed ZeroPhobia, a treatment delivered through a smartphone app and a basic VR viewer.
